00058         streambuf* OgreDataStreamBuf::setbuf (char* s, streamsize n)
00059         {
00060             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00061             World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::setbuf()");
00062             #endif
00063 
00064             if ( 0==n ) //They want unbuffered input, well they can't have it
00065             {
00066                 this->SetInternalBuffer(0);
00067             }else{
00068                 Whole CurrentLocation = this->GetCurrentLocation();
00069                 if(this->CheckInternalBuffer(CurrentLocation))      //Does a Buffer already exist?
00070                 {
00071                     delete [] this->eback();
00072                 }else{
00073                     CurrentLocation = 0;
00074                 }
00075                 this->setg(s,s,s+n);
00076                 this->LoadAtOnce = n;
00077                 this->SetInternalBuffer(CurrentLocation);
00078             }
00079 
00080             return this;
00081         }

00083         streampos OgreDataStreamBuf::seekoff ( streamoff off, ios_base::seekdir way, ios_base::openmode which)
00084         {
00085             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00086             World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::seekoff()");
00087             #endif
00088             if (ios_base::out & which)
00089                 { return -1; }
00090 
00091             switch(way)
00092             {
00093                 case ios_base::beg :
00094                     #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00095                     World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::seekoff() via Begin seek logic");
00096                     #endif
00097                     return this->seekpos((streampos)off,which);
00098 
00099                 case ios_base::cur :
00100                     #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00101                     World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::seekoff() via current location seek logic");
00102                     #endif
00103                     return this->seekpos(this->GetCurrentLocation()+off,which);
00104 
00105                 case ios_base::end :
00106                     #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00107                     World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::seekoff() via end seek logic");
00108                     #endif
00109                     return this->seekpos((this->OgreStream->size()-1)+off, which);
00110 
00111                 default:
00112                     return -1;
00113             }
00114 
00115         }

00117         streampos OgreDataStreamBuf::seekpos ( streampos sp, ios_base::openmode which )
00118         {
00119             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00120             World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::seekpos()");
00121             #endif
00122             if (ios_base::out & which)
00123                 { return -1; }
00124 
00125             if(this->CheckStream(sp))
00126             {
00127                 this->SetInternalBuffer(sp);
00128             }else{
00129                 sp=-1;
00130             }
00131 
00132             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00133             World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::seekpos()");
00134             #endif
00135             return sp;
00136         }

00139         std::streamsize OgreDataStreamBuf::showmanyc (void)
00140         {
00141             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00142             World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::showmanyc()");
00143             #endif
00144             if(0==this->OgreStream->size())
00145             {
00146                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00147                 World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::showmanyc() returning -1");
00148                 #endif
00149                 //Ogre Docs state 0 is a special case
00150                 return -1;
00151             }else{
00152                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00153                 World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::showmanyc() returning " << this->OgreStream->size();
00154                 #endif
00155                 return static_cast<signed int>(this->OgreStream->size()-this->GetCurrentLocation());
00156             }
00157         }

00159         std::streamsize OgreDataStreamBuf::xsgetn(char* s, std::streamsize n)
00160         {
00161             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00162             World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::xsgetn(char* s=" << Toint(s) << ", std::streamsize n=" << n << ")"; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00163             #endif
00164 
00165             bool Fail=false;
00166             Whole Current = this->GetCurrentLocation();
00167             Whole Destination = Current+n;
00168             Whole HowManyToRead=0;
00169 
00170             if(this->CheckStream(Current))
00171             {
00172                 if(this->CheckStream(Current+n))
00173                 {
00174                     HowManyToRead=n;                //The Whole range is good
00175                 }else{
00176                     HowManyToRead=this->OgreStream->size()-Current; //To close to end of stream
00177                 }
00178             }else{
00179                 Fail=true; //The Current locataion is invalid relative to the stream
00180             }
00181 
00182             if(!Fail)
00183             {
00184                 this->OgreStream->seek(Current);
00185                 std::streamsize BytesRetrieved = this->OgreStream->read(s,HowManyToRead);
00186                 this->SetInternalBuffer(Current+BytesRetrieved);
00187                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00188                 World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::xsgetn() After calling this->SetInternalBuffer(" << Current+BytesRetrieved << ") and returning " << BytesRetrieved; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00189                 #endif
00190                 return BytesRetrieved;
00191             }else{
00192                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00193 
00194                 World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::xsgetn() and returning EOF"; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00195                 #endif
00196                 return traits_type::eof();
00197             }
00198         }

00200         int OgreDataStreamBuf::underflow()
00201         {
00202             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00203             World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::underflow()");
00204             #endif
00205 
00206             Whole Destination = this->GetCurrentLocation();
00207             Whole OrigReadPosition = this->OgreStream->tell();
00208 
00209             if(this->CheckStream(Destination))
00210             {
00211                 this->SetInternalBuffer(Destination);               //This should re-center the buffer around the current read location
00212             }
00213 
00214             if( this->OgreStream->tell()<=OrigReadPosition )        //we either couldn't advance the read position or moved it backwards
00215             {
00216                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00217                 World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::underflow() After a failure");
00218                 #endif
00219                 return traits_type::eof();
00220             }else{
00221                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00222                 World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::underflow() After performing requested loading");
00223                 #endif
00224                 return Toint(this->gptr());
00225             }
00226 
00227         }

00237         int OgreDataStreamBuf::pbackfail ( int c )
00238         {
00239             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00240             World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::pbackfail()");
00241             #endif
00242             Whole Destination = this->GetCurrentLocation()-1;
00243             if(this->CheckStream(Destination))
00244             {
00245                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00246                 World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::pbackfail() after backing up once");
00247                 #endif
00248                 this->SetInternalBuffer(Destination);
00249                 return Toint(this->gptr());
00250             }else{
00251                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00252                 World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::pbackfail() with failure");
00253                 #endif
00254                 return traits_type::eof();
00255             }
00256         }

00269             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00270             World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Entering/exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::overflow()");

00276         void OgreDataStreamBuf::SetInternalBuffer(const streampos& Destination)
00277         {
00278             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00279             World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::SetInternalBuffer( streampos Destination=" << Destination <<" )" ; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00280             #endif
00281 
00282             if( Destination < 0)                                                            // Basic Error Checking
00283                 { throw (Exception("Beyond Stream Bounds: Before Stream begins")); }
00284             if( Destination > this->OgreStream->size() && this->OgreStream->size()!=0 )
00285                 { throw (Exception("Beyond Stream Bounds: After end of known stream")); }
00286 
00287             Whole BufferSize;
00288             if (this->egptr() == 0 || this->egptr() == 0 || this->eback())
00289                 { BufferSize=0; }
00290             else
00291                 { BufferSize = this->egptr() - this->eback(); }
00292             const Whole StreamSize = this->OgreStream->size();
00293 
00294             if (BufferSize == this->LoadAtOnce)                                             //Bufferexists and it is the right size, just Load data
00295             {
00296                 this->SetInternalBuffer(this->eback(), this->LoadAtOnce, Destination);
00297             }else if(0==BufferSize){                                                        //Buffer Doesn't exist, create new one and fill it
00298                 if(this->LoadAtOnce < StreamSize)
00299                 {
00300                     char* Buffer = new char [this->LoadAtOnce];                                 //What is left to load is simply one chunk of many, lets one one of default size
00301                     this->SetInternalBuffer(Buffer, this->LoadAtOnce, Destination);
00302                 }else{
00303                     char* Buffer = new char [StreamSize];                                       //Want to load more than exists, simply load what exists.
00304                     this->SetInternalBuffer(Buffer, StreamSize, Destination);
00305                 }
00306             }else{                                                                          //Buffer does exist and it is all wrong, Nuke and Pave(Most likely)
00307                 if(StreamSize==BufferSize)                                                      //Maybe we set it because the stream is too small
00308                     { this->SetInternalBuffer(this->eback(), BufferSize, Destination); }
00309                 else                                                                            //not likely, this thin is some wierd size, and must be nuked
00310                 {
00311                     #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00312                     World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Mysterious Buffer Size, Deleting and creating fresh" ) ;
00313                     #endif
00314                     delete [] this->eback();
00315                     this->setg(0,0,0);
00316                     this->SetInternalBuffer(Destination);
00317                 }
00318             }
00319             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00320             World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::SetInternalBuffer( streampos )" ) ;
00321             #endif
00322         }
00323 
00324         //OgreDataStreamBuf::SetInternalBuffer(BeginPtr=0, BufferSize=76793, Destination=10000)
00325         void OgreDataStreamBuf::SetInternalBuffer(char* BeginPtr, const Whole& BufferSize, const streampos& Destination)
00326         {
00327             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00328             World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::SetInternalBuffer(char* BeginPtr=" << Tounsignedint(BeginPtr) << ", Whole BufferSize=" << BufferSize << ", streampos::Destination=" << Destination << ")"; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00329             #endif
00330             if (this->SeekBackOnload > (this->MaxSeekBack * BufferSize) )
00331                 { this->SeekBackOnload = this->MaxSeekBack * BufferSize; }
00332 
00333             Whole StreamSize = this->OgreStream->size();
00334             if (Destination<this->SeekBackOnload)                                           //But wait are we too close to the beginning?
00335             {
00336                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00337                 World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::SetInternalBuffer(char*,Whole,streampos) calling SetInternalBuffer(char*,Whole,streampos,streampos) because we were too close to the beginning of the stream. " ; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00338                 #endif
00339                 this->SetInternalBuffer(BeginPtr, BufferSize, Destination, Destination);
00340             }
00341             else if (StreamSize-(BufferSize-this->SeekBackOnload)<Destination)              //Or maybe too close to the end?
00342             {
00343                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00344                 World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::SetInternalBuffer(char*,Whole,streampos) calling SetInternalBuffer(char*,Whole,streampos,streampos) because we were too close to the end of the stream. Determined by (StreamSize-(BufferSize-this->SeekBackOnload) < Destination)/("<< StreamSize << "-(" << BufferSize << "-" << this->SeekBackOnload << ") < " << Destination << ")" ; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00345                 #endif
00346                 this->SetInternalBuffer(BeginPtr, BufferSize, Destination, this->LoadAtOnce-(static_cast<streampos>(StreamSize)-Destination) );
00347             }
00348             else                                                                            //We must be in the middle
00349             {
00350                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00351                 World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::SetInternalBuffer(char*,Whole,streampos) calling SetInternalBuffer(char*,Whole,streampos,streampos) because we were in the middle of the stream. " ; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00352                 #endif
00353                 this->SetInternalBuffer(BeginPtr, BufferSize, Destination, this->SeekBackOnload);
00354             }
00355         }
00356 
00357         void OgreDataStreamBuf::SetInternalBuffer(char* BeginPtr, const Whole& BufferSize, const streampos& Destination, const streampos& BackFill)
00358         {
00359             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00360             World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::SetInternalBuffer(BeginPtr=" << Tounsignedint(BeginPtr) << ", BufferSize=" << BufferSize << ", Destination=" << Destination << ", BackFill=" << BackFill << ")" ; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00361             #endif
00362             this->OgreStream->seek(Destination-BackFill);
00363             this->OgreStream->read(BeginPtr, BufferSize);
00364             this->setg(BeginPtr, BeginPtr+BackFill, BeginPtr+BufferSize);
00365         }

00367         bool OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckInternalBuffer(const streampos& BeginPoint, const streampos& EndPoint)
00368         {
00369             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00370             World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckInternalBuffer( streampos " << BeginPoint << ", streampos " << EndPoint << " )"; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00371             #endif
00372 
00373             if (this->egptr() == 0 || this->egptr() == 0 || this->eback())
00374             {
00375                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00376                 World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckInternalBuffer()=0 NoBuffer";World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00377                 #endif
00378                 return false;
00379             }
00380 
00381             //Load with raw memory locations whose values are functionally random, but relative locations are the same from the OgreStream
00382             char* CharBufferStart = this->eback();
00383             char* CharBufferEnd = this->egptr();
00384 
00385             if ( CharBufferEnd < CharBufferStart)
00386             {
00387                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00388                 World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckInternalBuffer()=false (Begin of corrupt buffer)";World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00389                 #endif
00390                 return false;
00391             }
00392 
00393             Whole BufferSize = CharBufferStart - CharBufferEnd;
00394             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00395             World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Raw Pointers - CharBufferStart=" << Tounsignedint(CharBufferStart) << ", CharBufferEnd=" << Tounsignedint(CharBufferEnd) << " and BufferSize=" << BufferSize; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00396             #endif
00397 
00398             // This function assumes that the cursor in the Ogre stream is the equal to egptr()
00399             Whole WhereIsBufferEnd = this->OgreStream->tell();
00400             Whole BufferEnd = this->OgreStream->tell();
00401             Whole BufferStart = BufferEnd - BufferSize;
00402             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00403             World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Stream Locations - BufferStart=" << BufferStart << ", BufferEnd=" << BufferEnd << ", Stream End=" << this->OgreStream->size() ;
00404             World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00405             #endif
00406 
00407             if( BufferStart<BeginPoint && BeginPoint<BufferEnd )
00408             {
00409                 if( 0==EndPoint || (BufferStart<BeginPoint && BeginPoint<BufferEnd) )
00410                 {
00411                     #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00412                     World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckInternalBuffer() - Returning True" ; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00413                     #endif
00414                     return true;
00415                 }else{
00416                     #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00417                     World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckInternalBuffer() - Returning False" ; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00418                     #endif
00419                     return false;
00420                 }
00421             }else{
00422                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00423                 World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckInternalBuffer() - Returning False" ; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00424                 #endif
00425                 return false;
00426             }
00427         }
00428 
00429         bool OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckStream(const Whole& BeginPoint, const Whole& EndPoint)
00430         {
00431             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00432             World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckStream( Whole " << BeginPoint << ", Whole " << EndPoint << " )" ;
00433             World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00434             #endif
00435 
00436             if( 0<=BeginPoint && BeginPoint<=this->OgreStream->size() )
00437             {
00438                 if( 0==EndPoint || (0<=BeginPoint && BeginPoint<=this->OgreStream->size()) )
00439                 {
00440                     #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00441                     World::GetWorldPointer()->Log( "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckStream() - Returning True" );
00442                     #endif
00443                     return true;
00444                 }else{
00445                     #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00446                     World::GetWorldPointer()->Log( "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckStream() - Returning False" );
00447                     #endif
00448                     return false;
00449                 }
00450             }else{
00451                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00452                 World::GetWorldPointer()->Log( "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::CheckStream() - Returning False");
00453                 #endif
00454                 return false;
00455             }
00456         }

00460             return this->OgreStream->isReadable();

00468         Whole OgreDataStreamBuf::GetCurrentLocation()
00469         {
00470             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00471             World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Entering OgreDataStreamBuf::GetCurrentLocation()"; World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00472             #endif
00473 
00474             if (this->gptr()==0 || this->egptr()==0 || this->eback()==0 )
00475             {
00476                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00477                 World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::GetCurrentLocation()=0";World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00478                 #endif
00479                 return 0;
00480             }
00481 
00482             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00483             World::GetWorldPointer()->LogStream << "Exiting OgreDataStreamBuf::GetCurrentLocation() =" << (this->OgreStream->tell() - (this->egptr()-this->gptr())); World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();World::GetWorldPointer()->Log();
00484             #endif
00485             return this->OgreStream->tell() - (this->egptr()-this->gptr());
00486         }
